title: Windows 11's Recall AI is now rolling out on Copilot+ PCs
summary: Microsoft has confirmed that Windows Recall is rolling out to everyone with Windows 11 KB5055627 on Copilot+ PCs. [...]

title: Windows 11 KB5055627 update released with 30 new changes, fixes
summary: ​​Microsoft has released the KB5055627 preview cumulative update for Windows 11 24H2 with many new features gradually rolling out, and some new bug fixes for everyone. [...]

title: Craft CMS RCE exploit chain used in zero-day attacks to steal data
summary: Two vulnerabilities impacting Craft CMS were chained together in zero-day attacks to breach servers and steal data, with exploitation ongoing, according to CERT Orange Cyberdefense. [...]

title: Marks & Spencer pauses online orders after cyberattack
summary: British retailer giant Marks & Spencer (M&S) has suspended online orders while working to recover from a recently disclosed cyberattack. [...]

title: Mobile provider MTN says cyberattack compromised customer data
summary: African mobile giant MTN Group announced that a cybersecurity incident has compromised the personal information of some of its subscribers in certain countries. [...]

title: Windows "inetpub" security fix can be abused to block future updates
summary: A recent Windows security update that creates an 'inetpub' folder has introduced a new weakness allowing attackers to prevent the installation of future updates. [...]

title: Baltimore City Public Schools data breach affects over 31,000 people
summary: ​Baltimore City Public Schools notified tens of thousands of employees and students of a data breach following an incident in February when unknown attackers hacked into its network. [...]

title: North Korean Hackers Spread Malware via Fake Crypto Firms and Job Interview Lures
summary:
North Korea-linked threat actors behind the Contagious Interview have set up front companies as a way to distribute malware during the fake hiring process.
"In this new campaign, the threat actor group is using three front companies in the cryptocurrency consulting industry—BlockNovas LLC (blocknova
